pilots.name: Esege Tuketu
pilots.caption: Selfless Hero
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends or performs an attack, it may spend your focus tokens as if that ship has them.

pilots.name: Miranda Doni
pilots.caption: Heavy Hitter
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or, if you are not shielded, you may roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

pilots.name: Warden Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Koensayr Manufacturing's K-wing boasts an advanced SubLight Acceleration Motor and an unprecedented 18 hardpoints, granting it unrivaled speed and firepower.
